channel.title: Google Reader on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Google Reader on PR

item.title: Google Reader - Take 2
item.description:
I was insanely angry with Google’s decision still I am. Here are some stats from my Google Reader takeout data.

  • Following 44 people
  • Followed by 31 people
  • 690 Articles shared* with me
  • 1017 Articles shared* by me
  • 5657 Starred Articles

If you are people who think Social feed is replacing it, I promise you it never will. Reader is completely a different beast. I agree with FÃ¼hrer here. Leave.

item.title: Don't Kill Google Reader
item.description:
Larry, if all these are because of Steve’s advice. Learn one important attribute of Steve, his ability to change his mind.

Kill products that are copycat of others (cough! cough! Google+). Whatever the efforts that went into recent changes of Google reader (Unified theme, Removing “Share” feature and add “+1” features) are the reasons why there was a decline in usage.

item.title: How to install Grease monkey scripts on Google Chrome 21
item.description: Chrome updated its policy to not to install extensions and scripts outside of Google webstore by default. (Gatekeeper, everyone wants to be the police)

item.title: Pure Reader for Chrome
item.description: I love the theme of the Pure Reader for Safari (http://nadesign.net/safari/). I’ve ported the CSS as a userscript to use it with Google Chrome. Firefox need some css modification pls find the css here.
